page.title: 18RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: The survey area showed little scope for recreation and leisure activities. The two caravan parks did however offer facilities to people in the holiday periods. Tourists came from lots off different places as far away as Wales to the Shangri-La caravan park. The caravan parks offer some entertainment in the summer. Other features in the survey area were the two pubs which cater for the locals as well as the holiday-makers. However there is not much else in this area particularly for teenagers who would go to Clacton or Colchester for things like the cinema and disco's. This area realy offers a peacefull, quiet location for people on holiday and has got nice lanes and farm tracks for walking. The coast is not very far away.
